episode_event_general_anniversary_2021/6:
We’re here to invite you to a special battle event
that Lear is putting on—the Unity Gala!

We wanted to share our excitement with you in
person rather than simply dropping off an invite.

Our hope is that we can all use this gala to
express how much we love our partner Pokémon!

Yes! Lear actually asked the three of us to host
the event.

He even had these fancy outfits made for us just
for the occasion!

We’re going to wear them when we take the
stage in the arena.

And the audience is going to get to see some
impeccably stylish battling!

I can’t wait! Hope to see you there,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

I’m so excited for the
Unity Gala!

Getting to battle someone I respect so much at
an event like this... It’s like a dream come true!

It sounds like you’ve chosen your opponent for
the gala, then?
I have! It’s someone I really owe a lot to.
I’m not sure who to invite yet...

The gala’s going to be wonderful! Let’s all enjoy
it together!
